subject: Hockey, Ice
Officiating (Sports)
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Three weeks into a compressed season, N.H.L. teams are averaging a combined 8.4 power-play opportunities per game, compared with 6.6 last year, with fighting up.
snippet: Three weeks into a compressed season, N.H.L. teams are averaging a combined 8.4 power-play opportunities per game, compared with 6.6 last year, with fighting up.
